version_description:
NEW Summer Camp special and lots more goodies!

With the vacation in full swing, we’ll keep your maestros playing all summer long with fun free songs released weekly throughout the break.  Learn to play tons of new songs with personalized step-by-step practice options in a fun summer camp special section.

NEW next-generation acoustic engine for improved note recognition and an even smoother learning experience.

And thanks to your feedback we made multiple bug fixes and a bunch of other improvements:
-The clefs now look straight and not crooked:)
- Song audio snippets now play when tap the song box

Oh, and you’ll see the icon had a cool new summer makeover.

NEW Summer Camp special and lots more goodies!

With the vacation in full swing, we’ll keep your maestros playing all summer long with fun free songs released weekly throughout the break.  Learn to play tons of new songs with personalized step-by-step practice options in a fun summer camp special section.

NEW next-generation acoustic engine for improved note recognition and an even smoother learning experience.

And thanks to your feedback we made multiple bug fixes and a bunch of other improvements:

Oh, and you’ll see the icon had a cool new summer makeover.

This one’s a biggie with LOTS of new goodies. We’ve been listening to your great feedback and have added more Journey chapters (!), new content, a whole lot of teaching tools and squashed a gazillion bugs!

In more detail:
- New extended Journey! 12 new chapters added for more advanced levels, making it a grand total of 50 

- New content! J.S. Bach Inventions BWV 772-786 for all you classical lovers 

- New Home Challenge Center for teachers to easily manage homework without starting a lesson! Brand new interface to quickly assign homework to multiple students at the same time, stats on assigned homework, ability to reassign old pieces easily and ability to force learn mode

- New secure access to Parents/Teachers zone! Optional use of the iPad's passcode or Touch ID instead of the two-finger swipe (enabled from within the app settings)

- New updated rank names up to rank 500 

- Multiple bug fixes, performance enhancements and other improvements

Keep your feedback coming! Write us at education@joytunes.com with anything you need help with or if you’ve found something buggy. We’ll then work our magic :)

Now fully optimized for iOS 11

Thanks to your feedback we also fixed a few bugs and nasty crashes:
- We fixed a really annoying bug that sometimes happened when trying to access the membership tab. Sorry about that.
- You’ll now have a better experience when you have a problematic network
- Other minor bug fixes 
 
Keep your feedback coming! Write us at education@joytunes.com with anything you need help with or if you’ve found something buggy. We’ll then work our magic :)

This MAJOR update brings the best experience yet. It’s also the biggest release for performance related fixes ever. We’ve been listening to your amazing feedback and have been working extra hard to add fun new content, LOTS of performance boosts,  iOS 12 optimization and squash a gazillion bugs. Our developers and musicians can sleep peacefully now.  

In more detail:
- New songs include the famous Gymnopédie, Dance of the Sugar Plum Fairy, California Dreamin’ and the Westworld theme song. 
- The app used to crash because of the memory pressure, so we reduced this pressure dramatically by almost half with multiple fixes. Now the app is more stable as it doesn’t take up as much memory.  
- Images load much faster for a smoother scrolling experience. Especially on older devices. 
- Piano Maestro is more powerful than it has ever been, so now you can enjoy longer playing sessions without it crashing.
- One specific bug causing  the “Next” button at the end of levels to malfunction has been eliminated. Now it works again at the end of levels in the Journey, Method Books and Home Challenge. 
- Fully optimized for iOS 12. 
- Overall stability of the app has improved thanks to multiple bug fixes and other improvements.

Keep your feedback coming! Write us at education@joytunes.com with anything you need help with or if you’ve found something buggy. We’ll then work our magic :)

This MAJOR update is a big one with LOTS of new goodies.  We’ve been listening to your amazing feedback and have been working extra hard to add tons of fun new content, an improved Library search and squashed a gazillion bugs at the same time. Our developers and musicians can sleep peacefully now.

In more detail:
- New songs to celebrate the upcoming birthday of one of the greatest composers of all time - J.S. Bach! Now you can enjoy learning to play the beautiful Arioso, Little Prelude in C Major, Joy (theme from Cantata) and Ave Maria (Bach/Gounod).
- New pop songs! Have fun playing top-charting hits like Old Town Road and Girl On Fire.
- Now it’s easier than ever to search in the growing Library! We’ve added the ability to search in exercises and method books so you don’t feel like you’re looking for a needle in a haystack. Phew.
- Overall stability of the app has improved thanks to multiple bug fixes and other improvements.

Keep your feedback coming! Write us at education@joytunes.com with anything you need help with or if you’ve found something buggy. We’ll then make sure to work our magic :)

Now fully optimized for iOS 13.

Thanks to your feedback we also fixed a few pesky bugs that caused the app to crash:
- Share the Moment bug has been eliminated:) 
- The app no longer crashes when you try to connect to a teacher. 

---------

Now fully optimized for iOS 13.

Thanks to your feedback we also fixed a few pesky bugs that caused the app to crash:
- The app no longer crashes when watching a video.
- Share the Moment bug has been eliminated:) 
- Sometimes the app crashed when you tried to connect to a teacher. It shouldn't have done this, so we fixed it. 

---------

This MAJOR update is a big one with LOTS of new goodies.  We’ve been listening to your amazing feedback and have been working hard to give teachers the ability to hide songs, save favorite songs for easy access, added tons of fun new songs and squashed a gazillion bugs at the same time. Our developers and musicians can sleep peacefully now.  
In more detail: 

-Don’t want your students learning and playing a specific song? Now you can hide them with a new teacher control that allows you to hide songs! Just tap on the hide song icon. 
-Now you can save your favorite songs for easy access with a new super cool favorites category in the library! Just tap on the heart icon to create your own list of songs you want to learn.  
-Overall stability of the app has improved thanks to multiple bug fixes and other improvements. Phew.
-Ability to sign in with Apple. 

Keep your feedback coming! Write us at education@joytunes.com with anything you need help with or if you’ve found something buggy. We’ll then make sure to work our magic :)

This MAJOR update is a big one with LOTS of new goodies.  We’ve been listening to your amazing requests and are super happy to add a magical, musical adventure for you and your students to enjoy in a new Disney Song Special!

In more detail: 
* Fun Disney special with magical songs for your students to learn.
* Iconic songs like "How Far I’ll Go" from Moana and "Part Of Your World" from The Little Mermaid will be added to the Library.
* All songs have personalized step-by-step practice options making it easy for your students to get playing.
* Enjoy quality time together as a family while you play these classic songs, adding that touch of Disney magic into your home.

Overall stability of the app has also improved thanks to our developers squashing multiple bugs and making other improvements. Phew. We also added the ability to search for your favorite songs in method books too. Our developers and musicians can sleep peacefully now.

Keep your feedback coming! Write us at education@joytunes.com with anything you need help with or if you’ve found something buggy. We’ll then make sure to work our magic :)
